solution_line_template: 25% of the apples are sour because {total_percentage} - {sweet_apple_percentage_num} = <<{total_percentage}-{sweet_apple_percentage_num}={sour_apple_percentage_num}>>{sour_apple_percentage_num}
The average price of an apple sold is $.4 because {sweet_apple_percentage_decimal}({sweet_apple_price}) + {sour_apple_percentage_decimal}({sour_apple_price})= {average_apple_price}
